import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle, } from "./card"; import { Button } from "./button"; import { Badge } from "./badge"; import { Input } from "./input"; export function PantrySync() { const [uploadedImage, setUploadedImage] = useState(null); const [scanning, setScanning] = useState(false); const [scanComplete, setScanComplete] = useState(false); const samplePantryItems = [ { name: "Quinoa", quantity: "2 cups", category: "Grains", expiry: "2024-12-15", status: "fresh", }, { name: "Olive Oil", quantity: "500ml", category: "Oils", expiry: "2025-06-20", status: "fresh", }, { name: "Chickpeas", quantity: "3 cans", category: "Legumes", expiry: "2025-03-10", status: "fresh", }, { name: "Spinach", quantity: "1 bunch", category: "Vegetables", expiry: "2024-01-25", status: "expiring", }, { name: "Greek Yogurt", quantity: "500g", category: "Dairy", expiry: "2024-01-28", status: "expiring", }, { name: "Almonds", quantity: "200g", category: "Nuts", expiry: "2024-08-15", status: "fresh", }, ]; const suggestedRecipes = [ { name: "Quinoa Buddha Bowl", ingredients: ["Quinoa", "Spinach", "Chickpeas"], missing: ["Sweet potato", "Avocado"], match: "85%", image: "ü•ó", }, { name: "Mediterranean Salad", ingredients: ["Spinach", "Olive Oil", "Chickpeas"], missing: ["Tomatoes", "Cucumber"], match: "78%", image: "ü•ô", }, ]; const handleImageUpload = (event) => { const file = event.target.files[0]; if (file) { setUploadedImage(URL.createObjectURL(file)); setScanning(true); // Simulate AI scanning setTimeout(() => { setScanning(false); setScanComplete(true); }, 3000); } }; const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case "fresh": return "bg-success text-white"; case "expiring": return "bg-warning text-foreground"; case "expired": return "bg-destructive text-white"; default: return "bg-gray-100 text-foreground"; } }; const getStatusText = (status) => { switch (status) { case "fresh": return "Fresh"; case "expiring": return "Expiring Soon"; case "expired": return "Expired"; default: return "Unknown"; } }; return (
